mapper.select: SELECT rm.RESERVE_TIME as reserveTime ,um.USER_NM as userNm ,um.USER_TEL as userTel ,wm.WORK_NM as workNm ,rm.OTHER_INFO as otherInfo ,rm.PAY_STATE as payState ,wrm.WORKER_NM as workerNm ,um.MILEAGE as mileage FROM naildb.reserve_master rm INNER JOIN naildb.user_master um ON rm.USER_NO = um.USER_NO LEFT JOIN naildb.work_master wm ON rm.WORK_KIND = wm.WORK_KIND LEFT JOIN naildb.pay_master pm ON rm.PAY_STATE = pm.PAY_STATE LEFT JOIN naildb.worker_master wrm ON rm.WORKER_CODE = wrm.WORKER_CODE WHERE rm.WORK_CATE = wm.WORK_CATE
